name: Card Battle Simulator
description:
Dive into the world of customizable card games! Whether you're a player seeking new challenges or an aspiring creator, this is for you.

Features:


- Play Solo: Take on Challenges, Draft, Random Decks, and Survival.
- Get Creative: Design games, cards, and special abilities.
- Online: Play your games with friends.
- In-game browser for games and mods.

Planned:


- Card design editor and custom art.
- More game types, ability options, effects & animations.

The game is still in development, with more content coming. Your feedback matters as the aim is to create a hub for players to share and play each other's games.
